# Longstrider (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of dirt)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 305

This spell gives you a +10 foot enhancement bonus to your base speed. It has no effect on other modes of movement, such as burrow, climb, fly, or swim.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
